title: Hour 1: Buffalo Beatdown
description:
Is Jalen Hurts future of the Eagles? Jeff Saturday and Keyshawn Johnson weigh-in on that. Plus, Keyshawn says Josh Allen is the best player in the NFL right now. Later RGIII hops on to discuss Mike Evans one-game suspension.
